Package org.gicentre.handy

Main package for creating a handy renderer

See: Description

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    HandyPresets
    Set of static classes for creating preset handy styles, such as pencil sketch, ink and watercolour, 'Sharpie' style etc.
    HandyRecorder
    A PGraphics class for rendering in a sketchy style.
    HandyRenderer
    The renderer that draws graphic primitives in a sketchy style.
    Simplifier
    Performs Douglas-Peucker simplification on linear coordinate collections.
    Version
    Stores version information about the Handy sketchy drawing package.

Package org.gicentre.handy Description

Main package for creating a handy renderer

This package includes the main classes for creating a handy renderer. Includes classes for producing rectangular hachures and for simplifying polylines.

Related Documentation

  • handy source code
  • Processing home page
Version 2.0, 4th April, 2016
